skills.skill: MS Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Excel

duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and execute master data maintenance, testing, reporting, and manufacturing support of SAP and associated boundary systems to maintain a compliant, effective, and efficient operation.

Assist in designing, testing, and maintaining manufacturing data, including, but not limited to, items, specifications, lookups, list of values, recipes, routings, formulas, process instructions, and process variables.
Translate business requirements into a robust data design which is compliant, efficient, and effective.
Develop and prioritize testing manufacturing and supply chain related setup and data from the site ERP system and associated boundary systems.
Perform business impact assessment on changes to ERP system, boundary systems, and business processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field from an accredited college or university required. 5+ years relevant work experience required, preferably in a pharmaceutical manufacturing environment.
